title: Consecutive levels after 18 is something we want normally...
body:
You worked hard to get 18 before everyone else...

but your team laggs behind and when the opposing team turns 18 before they do you can no longer carry.

GG

Is that right though?

Why not reward the player who worked the hardest?

From time to time there is a game that allows levels past 18.
Like in Ultra Rapid Fire we've seen it from time to time.

I would like that normally wouldn't you?

replies.body:
The thing is that level leads and item leads benefit someone on a snowbally champion more than a linear champion. If you play champions that don't snowball (e.g. tanks) you'll never be that person regardless of how well you've played (or at least it's MUCH harder) and thus it'd be kind of unfair to those players.

I do think that if you're level 18 you shouldn't share XP. So your allies can get full XP even though you're there to protect them.
Are you sure you want a zilean buff?
Yes, this will actually make it so other classes dont fall off super hard compared to adcs.
